name: Sleight of Hand
description: Whenever you attempt an act of legerdemain or manual trickery, such as planting something on someone else or concealing an object on your person, make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. The DM might also call for this check to determine whether you can lift a coin purse off another person or slip something out of another person's pocket.
typicalUses: Pick a pocket without being noticed
Conceal an object on your person
Perform a card trick or other manual trickery
Discreetly pass an item to someone else
